typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesADLSinput
moviesADLSinput select(mapColumn(
		{Movie Name} = Column_1,
		title = Column_2,
		genre = Column_3,
		year = Column_4,
		{rotten tomatoes} = Column_6
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renamecolumn
